p: My team is looking for a DevOps Engineer with 5+ years of experience for a long term contract, delivering cutting-edge technology solutions using AWS, CloudFoundry, Kubernetes, *nix, Vault, Terraform, Ansible, Python, Artifactory, Git, Jenkins, Concourse for CI/CD.
